reviews.review: It's very fun, but very competetive as well. There will always be at least 3 try hard players on your team. Besides that this game is a good expierience and fun to play when you feel you don't have a life.
Call of Duty BEFORE Call of Duty

One of the best shooters ever.
its kind of difficult and full of tryhards but it is an ok game
Es uno de los mejores, por no decir el mejor (TF2, CS, Portal 1-2, todo lo que tenga que ver con Source) juego que dispone Steam, muy recomendable y con un sin fin de posibilidades! :D

Its an awsome game, has loads of achievements and is just a fun game in general. The multiplayer is probably the best fun to have, its got many game modes like zombies which is a bit crap but its a fun idea and gun game which is great fun. The game has so much life to it and i feel its one of those games that will never die even with Counter Strike: Global Offensive out.

El mítico counter strike de nuestra adolescencia. Siempre tendrá un hueco en mi corazón por ser no solo un shooter si no un lugar donde pasarlo bien en distintos modos de juego (básicamente estaba más en mapas custom que en los normales) con una comunidad española increíble. Tardes puras de vicio jugando mapas de surf, jail, rpg, warcraft, multigames... La verdad que hoy en día sigue teniendo muchos jugadores y sigue siendo un puntazo.
Melhor jogo online de sempre digam o que disserem!

Counter-Strike: Source is a major step from the familiar Counter-Strike 1.6 we all grew to love. 
It brings the same mechanics, is more noob friendly and has some impressive graphics that were amazing to the date it was released. If you were a fan of Counter-Strike before it's nearly impossible not agreeing that it awsomely caries the it's predecessor's glory.
Highly recomend to any fan of the franchise

Counter Strike: Source Is one of the best First Person shooters ever created. It Is Hilariously fun, Action-Packed, and, furthermore it is a classic. The simplest objective: Kill the enemy team or plant or defuse the bomb. I am never in a bad mood when I play this game. Even if it is a simple game, It is one of the best games Ive ever played. In my opinion, It is the best game Valve Has created.
Ive played this game for .3 hours. That explains alot.

What hasn't been said about Counter Strike? It is heavily moddable, has an extensive community, and has quick gameplay with sharp controls and low system requirements. Some of the best things about Counter Strike lie in it's community, and the content they make. Zombie Escape, for example, is the gamemode I play most on, with close-knit groups of players and a fairly large variety of maps to play on.
I would dare argue that ALL Counter Strike games are worth buying for these very reasons, especially Counter Strike: Source.
If you play Gmod get tis game and see no errors

Counter-Strike : Source est le meilleur jeu de Terroriste et De Anti - Terroristes que je connaissent a Part certains defaut ce jeu est un Bon FPS je lui donnerais un 8 / 10

Grafik: Für das Release-Datum absolut annehmbar, zudem ist der Stil angenehm und für jede Szene (eSport/Casual/..) anpassbar durch Individualisierung mithilfe der Konsole.

Gameplay: Brauch man nicht viel zu sagen, man hat bestimmt schon viel von dem Spiel gehört. Dies ist eines der fairsten Spiele, die es gibt. Keine Perks oder Killstreaks. Pures 5gg.5 rundenbasierendes spektakel. Klassiker auf höchstem Niveau.

Singleplay: Nicht vorhanden, es will auch kein Singleplayerspiel sein.

Multiplayer: Latenzzeiten sind bei vielen Deutschen Servern sehr gut und schon allein die Tatsache, dass es Dedizierte Server gibt, ist ein guter plus Faktor.
The most classic FPS game with an unforgettable experience which is powered by Source the best game engine of a life-time :)
beste! Old but still good - nice aim, low graphics, much fun, very tactic
